name: SureIn
description: SureIn empowers SMBs to efficiently manage their risk and insurance. As an independent insurance platform, we keep track of the customer’s risk profile & insurance portfolio on an ongoing basis. Starting with the gastronomy vertical, SureIn tackles one vertical at a time to provide a best-in-class user centric product and service experience. We subsequently expand the proposition with the development of own and highly individualized insurance products, adding them into the mix of our all-in-one platform as well expanding vertically into adjacent industries.
